title: Bundles
body: May I ask why "X Month Bundles" don't have a set release date and are not revealed prior to release? I'd like to know why bundles are not a part of the month's sale schedule, because you might want to plan purchases and how you spend RP in advance. Is anything about this going to change?

replies.body: Sometime Surprise Sales do take place in League! I understand how you would like to prepare for them with that RP in advance, but sometimes the surprise really excites players. We do have the [Sales Page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) to update players of what going on in that month though which gives them a good heads up.
